name: Nigiri
description: A topping, usually fish, served on top of sushi rice.

name: Sashimi
description: Fish or shellfish served alone (no rice).

name: Maki
description: Rice and filling wrapped in seaweed.

name: Uramaki
description: Similar to the above, but rice is on the outside and seaweed wraps around the filling.

name: Temaki
description: Sushi that has been hand-rolled into a cone shape.
